extendedInfo.description: Play the classic card game Hearts. Either play against 4 computer opponents or play online against other users.â¢choose between normal and omnibus rulesâ¢easy intuitive touch interface â¢smooth animationsâ¢invite google+ friends

reviews.title: Game used to be fun
reviews.comment: Just discovered that the game will periodically lose track of the Jack of Diamonds.  A reboot of the device will correct the problem but you will of course lose the current game.
reviews.author: Marcus Wilkins

reviews.comment: Update sucks!! Put back the old version! Computer players shoot the moon 3+ times per game! Unlikely in a real game of hearts! Very disappointed....this USED to be my favorite game!!\tUpdate sucks!
reviews.author: Billi Fay

reviews.title: New update
reviews.comment: I downgraded my five star to two. The new update says \"moon shot\" even if it isn\'t. The scores get covered up. It needs to display the winner of the game more definitively. Hard to tell when the games ends. Especially with the scores covered by the cards. Go back to the old version until they get this one straightened out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay! It\'s Fixed
reviews.comment: Wow! I sent an email to the developer about the weird scoring that he introduced. Received an email and within an hour or so he fixed it! You rock! Hint: Look at the new settings!
reviews.author: Michele Petties

reviews.comment: Easy
reviews.author: Michael Patnode

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I use to LOVE this app but now I hate it. The new changes ruined it. The cards are hard to read, ads are a pain, and game shoots most of the time. Truly disappointing!
reviews.author: Tracy Gilliam

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: Shoots the moon every game !!!!! Poorly written app & adds freeze my phone regularly .
reviews.author: lyndon savage

reviews.title: Hearts
reviews.comment: Great easy game.
reviews.author: Richard Mcmillan

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Was my favorite game but the update has ruined it.   Cards are harder to read, ads get in the way and comp wins all the time.  Way to take a fun game and destroy it!
reviews.author: Kent Wipf

reviews.title: Great game, but ads make it TERRIBLE
reviews.comment: The game and gameplay is awesome and fun, but the ads between games are intrusive, loud, and nearly unskippable.  They also make my phone freeze in a black screen and I have to constantly restart my phone because of this.  I downloaded it a while back and uninstalled because of the ads.  I\'m considering doing the same again, but I hope to find an ad free version. // Updated: The ads and the crashes forced me to uninstall this game again. Please fix this game and try again!
reviews.author: B. Alex Thompson

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Sucks Unless you like playing against Rainman.  AI even goes as far as counting non Spades to drop the Queen on you.  It knows if You have the only higher suited card that was led.
reviews.author: John Hughes

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: Recent updated screwed this game up bad!  Was great for 3 years!  Glitches now.  They lay a spade and it won\'t let me get rid of any of my spades.  They are greyed out.  Makes me pick a different suit?  Not just spades either, happens alot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You can\'t lock thw rotation
reviews.comment: Love the game but when I lock the rotation of my phone it still rotates. Tough to play on my side in bed.
reviews.author: Mark Galluccio

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: This game is crap. It is very unfair and mostly just frustrates me. I gave it a very good go and I am uninstalling it today. :( waste of time. No human players ever shoot the moon as many times as this game has it happen ?!!? I call bs.
reviews.author: nicki weller

reviews.title: Junk App
reviews.comment: The game is not design to play fair. It\'s main purpose is to generate add revenue for the developers. DON\'T INSTALL
reviews.author: joe maryland

reviews.title: Galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: Running jelly bean. Game is \"really fast\". Plays as fast as you can. Addicting. However,  Ads are excessively intrusive, constantly hitting internet, burning up data and battery.  When queen is played the computer opponents do not play a heart on another player to stop shoot. This is not fair way to play. I get ace of hearts 80% of the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Size of card is big for my screen
reviews.comment: The old version was better. I would like it tobe reinstated.
reviews.author: Sarwat Jehan

reviews.title: Extraordinarily rude game
reviews.comment: Launches to sound ads at the end of the game. Attempts to shoot the moon most of the time.   Launches to sound ads at the end of the game just like spades game from same vendor. Wrote author but made no difference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Game cheats like hell. Not fun when you\'re getting screwed all the time!
reviews.author: Trevor Eno

reviews.title: This game has dementia
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what it is that makes this game forget its place and start over, but whatever it is I do it a lot. A well designed game app remembers your place. Add to that the THIRTY SECOND COMMERCIALS YOU CAN\'T SKIP ONE SECOND OF and I\'m done with this app. I don\'t mind using ad-supported apps, but holy cow, that is going too far.  Edit, August 24, 2013:  I put the app back on my phone. It has a lot of weaknesses but sadly every other free app was worse (and, from what I could tell from descriptions, screenshots and reviews the paid apps were no better). I\'m just too addicted to Hearts to do without it entirely.   I am not raising the number of stars, as I am not grading on a curve.
reviews.author: kat Folland
